page.title: 14Sutton Hall Farm
page.content: Sutton Hall farm is near to Hollinhey School.The farm is owned by Mr and Mrs Ernest Eardley who have three children.They all help on the farm but Lynne is still at Hollinhey.The farm has been in the family for 48 years.It was built in 1764 and has 124 acres.It is a sheep and dairy farm mainly with grassland which is used for silage. In May 1985 Lynne counted the livestock as follows: 105 cows,56 sheep, 45 young stock and 2 bulls.Mr Eardley usually helps in the organising of local sheep dog trials.
